comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Just for the record. The picture shows the Fokker F.XXII which was a smaller version of the Fokker F.XXXVI. Four were built, this one is registered PH-AJR. This machine was sold to the United Kingdom in Augus 1939, being registered there as  G-AFXR. Eventually it was impressed in the RAF as HM159. The machine crashed fatally in Scotland on 3 July 1943 killing the crew and the passengers.
